InteropTopicTriggerCriteria.name: InteropTopicTriggerCriteria
InteropTopicTriggerCriteria.description: Represents the criteria that trigger a notification for an interoperability topic.

AreBothRsrcStsRequired.description: Indicates if both the previous and current resource statuses are required to trigger a notification.

CreateOperationResultType.description: Specifies the result type when the operation type is Create.

CriteriaExpression.description: The trigger critera expressed in a machine-readable format.

CurrentResourceStatus.description: The status of the resource after the triggering update is made.

DeleteOperationResultType.description: Specifies the result when the operation type is Delete.

Description.description: The description of the interoperability topic trigger criteria.

EventCodeId.description: The code of the event that triggers the notification.

InteropTopicId.description: The interoperability topic for which the trigger criteria is defined.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic trigger criteria record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic trigger criteria record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the interoperability topic trigger criteria.

OperationType.description: Specifies the type of operation that triggers the subscription notification.

PreviousResourceStatus.description: The status of the resource before the triggering update is made.

Resource.description: The resource for which the notification is sent.

Type.description: Specifies the type of trigger that activates the interoperability topic.
